 As our DevOps Engineer, we will be relying on you to ensure that our technical infrastructure is robust and remains in good shape. You will lead the maintenance of our existing infrastructure and product deployments, and you will be heavily involved in growing that infrastructure and product deployments as we expand.

 Understand the existing technical deployments in use in CyberLitmus, both automated and manual.

 Perform incident management and root cause analysis.
